medical_history.chief_complaint: Spontaneous nosebleed and worsening shortness of breath.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced a 2-month history of worsening shortness of breath and frequent epistaxis. Symptoms intensified over this period.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia (HHT) diagnosed based on recurrent epistaxis, telangiectasia, and pulmonary arteriovenous malformations.
medical_history.family_history: Inheritable condition; HHT is inherited as an autosomal-dominant trait. No known causal mutations identified during genetic testing.
